content: This article is quite weak in my opinion. You are comparing React with vanilla JS: vanilla JS can never win! Why would you wrap an input element in the node that is getting updated? Of course you wouldn’t! Nonsense. Yes the virtual DOM is great thing that React does, but at least use an appropriate example and compare with another library or framework. One of Reacts main failings, in my opinion, is that it isn’t a framework. The comments show why React is so popular: too many people unable to see the bigger picture that just jump on the latest fad
